message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  It's a great deal for both of us, as it's well below my usual asking price. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $12,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but  $10,500 is the lowest I can go. Let's meet in the middle!

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on your price, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to offer $9,500, which is a fair compromise between our two positions.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 still doesn't quite work for me. Let's split the difference. I'm willing to sell for $10,000. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're interested.

Alice, I understand you're firm on your price, but $10,000 is still a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,750, which is a good compromise and gets us closer to an agreement. Let's make this happen.
Bob, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, and I'm trying to be flexible here. I can't go any lower than $9,900.  If you're serious about this deal, let's close it now.
